LanguageData.Lighting_Control.AwalysOnDesc: Determine whether the lamp will be always on.
LanguageData.LightingControl.AlwaysOnInDoorWithPawns: On indoor iff there exist awake colonists (slightly improve the performance)
LanguageData.LightingControl.AlwaysOnOutDoorAtNight: On outdoor iff the daylight level is less than 50% (slightly improve the performance)
